name: ExtraHouse
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The ExtraHouse skill allows you to control intelligent lighting and other devices using your smartphone. Just download ExtraHouse and you can manage by voice, for example, the light in your home and rooms (zones) as you like.
It is necessary to have a ExtraHouse device with the appropriate chip / module.

The application allows:
- control via Wi-Fi
- switching devices on and off
- any and smooth degree of dimming of light (bulbs)
- light color change from warm (WW) to cold (CW) - CCT function (bulbs)
- smooth RGB color change (RGB bulbs)
- the ability to control devices from anywhere in the world (Internet access required)
- built-in scenes with the ability to change settings
- the ability to set individual operation schedules (simulation of household members possible)
- the ability to group devices and create sent scenarios / functions
- the ability to create rooms and assign devices to them
- possibility of connecting to Amazon Alexa
- voice control via Alexa

ExtraHouse is a simple to use and functional application that allows you to control your smart home and its devices.
